items.sentence: Why can't you just do what I've asked you to do?
Tom told me he thought that Mary was displeased.
Tom has about twice as many stamps as Mary does.
The avalanche swept away everything in its path.
The only thing constant in this world is change.
The exhibition will stay open for another month.
In some countries capital punishment is illegal.
That mountain is covered in snow all year round.
Six hundred thousand men were killed or wounded.
Did God really create the earth in a single day?
